documentation.text:
@dev Provides a set of functions to operate with Base64 strings.
 _Available since v4.5._

documentation.text: @dev Converts a `bytes` to its Bytes64 `string` representation.

natspec.details: Provides a set of functions to operate with Base64 strings. _Available since v4.5._

opcodes: PUSH20 0x0 ADDRESS EQ PUSH1 0x80 PUSH1 0x40 MSTORE PUSH1 0x0 DUP1 REVERT INVALID LOG2 PUSH5 0x6970667358 0x22 SLT KECCAK256 0xE7 GASPRICE PUSH23 0x726314CA7E331663B844721B676BDD61B84EE09F969837 MOD DUP8 PUSH4 0x11791E64 PUSH20 0x6F6C634300080D00330000000000000000000000
